Package rohde_schwarz.rs_instrument

Class VisaSession

java.lang.Object
rohde_schwarz.rs_instrument.Visa
rohde_schwarz.rs_instrument.VisaSession
public class VisaSession extends Visa
VisaSession class abstracts the differences of different physical interfaces and session types and provides unified set of methods: - setting all the VISA properties depending on the session kind - read/write string/bytes - read/write string/bytes with OPC - system error querying methods

    • queryStringNoToutError

      public String queryStringNoToutError​(String query, Integer timeoutMs) throws RsInstrException
      Queries string of unknown length, and suppresses any timeout exceptions. If the VISA read ends with timeout, response is null You can set the VISA timeout locally just for this one call
      Throws:
      RsInstrException

    • queryStringWithOpc

      public String queryStringWithOpc​(String query, Integer timeoutMs) throws RsInstrException
      Query with OPC synchronization. The response length is unlimited. If timeoutMs is set to -1, it is taken from the current opcTimeout value.
      Throws:
      RsInstrException
